annotations.description: This cocktail was created by the legendary father of all Tiki Donn "The Beachcomber" Beach during WWII. The name is in reference to the morse code call sign ...
annotations.title: Tiki Cocktail: Three Dots and a Dash

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Martinique Rum
.5oz (15ml) Demerara Rum
.25oz (7.5ml) Allspice Dram
.25oz (7.5ml) Velvet Falernum
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Honey Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Orange Juice
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
3 Luxardo Cherries & Pineapple Cube Garnish

Blend with ice and pour into collins glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=usz9Feoj5ag
title: Three dots and a Dash
